name: quicktalk-fullstack-dev
description: QuickTalk 客服系统 - 全栈开发环境

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" --names "🦀 Backend,⚛️ Frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.check: npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend

author: QuickTalk Team
